name: Hell Droid
description:
"Hell Droid" is a simple 3D game , first ever solo dev effort with unity 3d.

Your mission is to save alien creatures from the workings of the devil and save their world.

It features:

21 levels for gameplay

Boss fight

Some cutscenes

7 weapons

6 powerups

13 different enemies to fight against.
